title: Great
review: This isn't just a great comedy but a great movie as the characters are on a journey and you experience the journey with them unlike movies in a few set locations the movies with traveling are usually the best to me

title: Ok
review: Not great but not this bad as this rating Margot Robbie is good and the story is just rushed and silly

title: Will Smith is great in this
review:
Will Smith's performance in this film is very underrated I just think the ending didn't conclude his characters arc
I think I just love the mystery of the monsters and the performance of will smith

title: Classic
review: Officially a classic no more needed ledger is obviously perfect as it has already been said millions of times but Christian bale is also underrated in his role as Batman this film is great with tension action and suspense all concluding in Christopher Nolan's best film

title: Joker is a masterpiece
review: Joker is a brilliant piece of film making and an instant classic it will be spoke about for years to come and is officially my favourite film and will be watching it more and more as the years go by and carry on getting mesmerised by the great performances score and choreography in this gritty character study 10/10

title: IT chapter 2 is good
review: I am a strong IT and Stephen king fan and this film actually fufilled my expectations with a darker pennywise great humour and a true ending to the book and done well to create a great story and journey with the losers club

title: Wow
review: What a film Joaquin Phoenix is class as always thank god this won best screenplay
